parameters.definition: Minimum number of locals to be moved
Number of people per kayak trip
Number of people per motorboat trip
Time per kayak trip in minutes
Time per motorboat trip in minutes
Minimum percentage of trips that should be by kayak

description: Due to an accident, at least \param{MinLocals} locals must be moved across a lake. They can either be transported over the lake by a kayak or a motorboat. Kayaks can transport \param{PeoplePerKayak} people every trip and motorboats can transport \param{PeoplePerMotorboat} people every trip. Kayaks take \param{TimePerKayak} minutes per trip whereas motorboats take \param{TimePerMotorboat} minutes per trip. Due to the limited number of motorboats available to the locals, there can be at most \param{MaxMotorboatTrips} motorboat trips and at least \param{MinPercentKayakTrips}% of the trips should be by kayak. How many of each transportation method should be used to minimize the total amount of time needed to transport all the locals?
